title: Animal life at low tide
creator_credit: Pat Dowling and Pat Dowling Pictures
brief_description: A boy and girl visit the seashore and, at a tide-pool find and study many salt-water animals and their means of locomotion, protection and getting food. Included are starfish, tube-building sea worms, sea anemone, limpet, sea urchin, snails and the moulting of hermit crabs. Suitable for upper primary and lower secondary levels.
